properties.name: Wilmot
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot except that this covenant shall not prevent the occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Bel-Crest
properties.restrictor: Richard H. Bell, president of Bel-Crest, Inc.
properties.text: No persons of any race except the white race shall use or occupy any building on any lot except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race employed by an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Dryad's Grove
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: High Ledge Homes
properties.restrictor: Edward F. Hammel, President of High Ledge Homes, Inc.
properties.text: No persons of any race except the white race shall use or occupy any building on any lot except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race employed by an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Trout Brook Ridge
properties.restrictor: Arnold Holder, Vice President, Hillside Homes Corporation
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Unnamed Asylum Avenue
properties.restrictor: R.G. Bent, President of R.G. Bent Company
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the Caucasian race shall use or occupy any building or any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Lakewood Circle
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Greenway Park
properties.restrictor: Lawrence A. Converse, President of Greenway, Inc.
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Bowers Farm
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white or Caucasian race shall own, use or occupy any building or any lot in said tract, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race, domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Center Village
properties.text: No persons of any race except the white race shall use or occupy any buildings on any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race employed by an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Mountain View Heights
properties.source: vol. 41, pp. 293-94, and map 85; vol. 50, p. 55
properties.text: No persons of any race except the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race employed by an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Gilridge

properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building on any lot except that this covenant shall not prevent the occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Village Farms
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot except that this covenant shall not prevent the occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Rosedale
properties.restrictor: Thomas Amatruda, President of the Fusco-Amatruda Company
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race, shall use or occupy any building or any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race, domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Beaver St
properties.restrictor: Joseph E. Maselli and Pasquale Severino
properties.text: No race other than the white race shall use or occupy said dwelling, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race employed by the owner or tenant.

properties.name: Circular Ave
properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Gilbert Homes

properties.text: No persons of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot except that this covenant shall not prevent the occupant by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant.

properties.name: Colonial Village
properties.restrictor: Albert G. Swanson and The Lomas & Nettleton Co.
properties.text: No person of any race other than the white race shall use or occupy any building or any lot, except that this covenant shall not prevent the occupancy by domestic servants of a different race domiciled with an owner or tenant of any building.
